replies.author: tj328111241
replies.txt_content:
我勒个去~看了这个MOD原作者的帖子,居然才16岁~~!!!
以下原文:
About Me
My name is Anton, I’m 16 years old and love to play Minecraft.One day me and my friend decided to try and make a mod, but first we had to learn the basics of modding. After we learned some tricks, we made little private mods to train our skills. So I decided to try and make my first public mod, (Ore Dimension’s)Also we would appreciate if you would donate to us. Not for personal purpose’s but for school and for you guys! It really helps us going, even if it’s ?0.1! (Donators above ?5 get a special place here on the forum and I'll make a personal mod sword mod for you! Posted Image)
